data.title: Premade Fiction, Apocalyptica Book Covers
data.meta_description: Premade Book Covers - Premade Fiction, Apocalyptica Book Covers -  Bookcoverzone.com - Bunker 9098 . Covering every genre from romance to fantasy. Customize the covers online before buying. With Live Build, Preview and 3D Rendering. Both fiction and non fiction covers. All designs are only sold once.
data.text:
Bunker #9098

“A cityscape in ruins with dark, ominous clouds and fires burning in several buildings, conveying a sense of destruction and chaos.”

$119.00 $89.00

Use our cover maker online to create a stunning book cover design. With our innovative LiveBuild engine you can see this book cover with your own name and book title before committing to purchase it.

The texts on this cover are just placeholders, added by the book cover designer. You can customize them instantly by clicking CUSTOMIZE.

This book cover has 3 lines for the title, 1 line for the subtitle, 1 line for the author, 2 lines for the hook, and finally 1 line for the genre.

The most popular tags describing this Apocalyptica premade book cover are horizontal, outdoors, city, death and war.

Other keywords revelant to this premade cover are violence, dead, hell, cityscape, empty, abandoned, aggression, destruction, heat - temperature, land, conflict, skyscraper, burning, pollution, sulking, fire - natural phenomenon, crisis, built structure, terrorism, building exterior, smoke - physical structure, bomb, exploding, accidents and disasters, crash, meteorite, ruined, the end, separation, earthquake, rubble, demolished, burnt, natural disaster, tornado, train - vehicle, extinct, judgment day - apocalypse, torn, cyclone, air pollution, hurricane - storm, steam train, misfortune, typhoon, dividing, collapsing, nuclear weapon, nuclear fallout, weapons of mass destruction, bombing, nuclear power station, hydrogen bomb, aftershock, sinkhole, derailment, demolishing, train crash.

Once you purchase a cover, it's yours and only yours. You can always come back at a future date to work on it and download it. You can change the texts, the trim size or the page count in case your book gets updated down the road. No time or revision limitations!
